msContents.summary: This is a tantric text written by Trilocanācārya. There is no any information about this text in the New Catalogus Catalogorum. Aufrecht Catalogus mentions very few manuscripts of this text. The published book edited by Sri. Vrajavallabha Dvivedi has different end than this manuscript. The manuscript ends with the verse number 25 of the 4th section of the caryāpāda. Dvivedi’s edition has total 41 verses in the 4th section of the caryāpāda. First Blank folio after cover has black spots, looks like fungus infected leaf.

msItem.title: Siddhāntasārāvalī
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 otaṃ yena jagaccarācaramidaṃ . protañca sarvam sadā . chyotante paśavo pi pāśanikarādyasya prasā
1v2 dena tat . omityādimanuccaradhvanigatañjyotiṣmatāndyitakaṃ vyomavyāpiparaṃ śīvākhyamakalañjyotiḥ prapadye dhīyā 1 śrīma
msItem.explicit: 272r 7 carakī ca vidāri ca putanā pāparākṣasī . iśānānādiṣu koṇeṣu rākṣasyotra vyavasthitā . śkandoryya 272r 8 mā ca jaṃbhaśca balīpicchagrahā ime . vāstubāhye padāddīkṣu saṃpūjyā padavarjjitā iti 272r 9 pauniyaṃ
msItem.finalRubric: 272r 9 iti siddhāntasāravalī saṃpūrṇaṃ hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu . śrīgurūbhyo namaḥ . .
